lines.text: You don't like my rice? What's wrong with with it? It's beautiful to me, but to you, rice is nothing... to us, it's just like my father and mother. Don't fuck with my family. If you have any dignity, apologize to the rice RIGHT NOW!
[Ko has Lung pinned down and at gunpoint]
What makes you think that the good guys always win?
[Ken and Ho both shoot Ko. After Ko hits the ground, Lung shoots him in the head]
What makes you think that the bad guys always win?

[To Ko and Sung, after a bloodbath]
We're dying; can we leave now?
I give you nothing, man... I give you shit!
There's no such thing as can't. You always have a choice.
